title: [見頂破頂] NBA 金州勇士球迷討論區 (4) Golden State Warriors

replies.msg:
2020-2021 NBA Season Golden State Warriors Roster
PG: Stephen Curry, Brad Wanamaker, Nico Mannion
SG: Andrew Wiggins, Jordan Poole,Damion Lee (Klay Thompson-injury)
SF: Kelly Oubre, Jr., Kent Bazemore
PF: Draymond Green, Eric Paschall, Alen Smailagic
C: James Wiseman, Kevon Looney, Marquese Chriss

歡迎各路勇迷一齊理性傾波！
p.s. Klay, Chriss, AS9 get well soon!

Post 1: https://lih.kg/2306549
Post 2: https://lih.kg/2339404
Post 3: https://lih.kg/2345669
Post 4: https://lih.kg/2352354

P.s
- 1001個個開post
- 為維持良好風氣，有時屌打得差冇問題，話trade XXX都可以。不過講埋trade邊個，拎咩換，trade個條友點樣幫到勇等等
- 試吓唔好講殺，講可以點改善

短期目標:
^ 20場波內最少贏到10場
^ Wiggins PPG 15 up
^ Oubre PPG 12 up
^ Wiseman 頭兩節2犯以內, PPG 12 up RPG 6 up
試咗加唔到相。。靠大家啦
